UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Targeted Modification of a Novel Amphibian Antimicrobial Peptide from Phyllomedusa tarsius to Enhance Its Activity against MRSA and Microbial Biofilm.
Literature.Author: Gao Y, Wu D, Wang L, Lin C, Ma C, Xi X, Zhou M, Duan J, Bininda-Emonds ORP, Chen T, Shaw C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MBC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=>512µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=>512µg/ml)
